channel.title: Fast Help Please
channel.description:
:eek: When i wanna run my server i click runserverand then a message comes up saying
"JAVA" is not reconised as a internel or a external command "
I need help with this fast becuasee i have had it for a long time Thanks !!!
ALSO !!!
How do i restart my server do i use the voule thing in my server folder :| Thanks Agian
POST QUICK PLEASE !!!! THANKS !!!

item.title: Fast Help Please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Either your PATH or CLASSPATH is not set. Google this up, and it will tell you how to set it!

GL!

item.title: Fast Help Please
item.dc:creator: @uk_team3rs uk team3rs
item.description:
@uk_team3rs wrote:

do i just download it to my desktop and try agian ??? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 12, 2008, 11:12:01 AM[/size][hr]i have downloaded the 6u2 JDK from the link u give me and saved it 2 my desktop . But still it is not working it is really bugging me please help me ! :mad: when i click edit the thing it comes up with is …
@echo off
color 0a
title Project Czar
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-jdk-6u5-windows-i586-p server
PAUSE

Is that right or have i got it totally wrong ??

Read full topic
